title: Epson PowerLite 2250U WUXGA 3LCD Projector - High Brightness and Resolution
description: The Epson PowerLite 2250U WUXGA 3LCD Projector offers superior image quality with a WUXGA resolution of 1920 x 1200 pixels, ideal for professional presentations and meetings. It features a brightness of 5,000 lumens for clear, visible images in any lighting condition. The advanced 3LCD technology delivers vibrant colors and precise image details, while the 15,000:1 contrast ratio provides deep blacks and bright whites. The projector includes HDMI, DisplayPort, and VGA inputs for versatile connectivity options and supports horizontal and vertical lens shift along with 1.6x optical zoom for flexible installation. With a long lamp life of up to 12,000 hours in Eco mode, the PowerLite 2250U is a reliable and high-performance choice for any business setting.
key_features: Up to 12,000 Hours Lamp Life in Eco Mode
meta_title: Epson PowerLite 2250U WUXGA 3LCD Projector - High Brightness and Resolution
meta_description: Shop the Epson PowerLite 2250U WUXGA 3LCD Projector for high brightness and resolution. Features include 1920 x 1200 WUXGA resolution, 5,000 lumens brightness, and advanced 3LCD technology.

title: Epson PowerLite 2250U WUXGA 3LCD Projector - Professional Presentation Solution
description: The Epson PowerLite 2250U WUXGA 3LCD Projector is the ultimate solution for professional presentations, offering high resolution and impressive brightness. With a WUXGA resolution of 1920 x 1200 pixels, it delivers detailed and vibrant images. The 5,000 lumens brightness ensures clear projections even in well-lit rooms, while the 3LCD technology provides accurate and consistent colors. The projector features a 15,000:1 contrast ratio for enhanced image quality and a range of connectivity options including HDMI, DisplayPort, and VGA. It supports flexible installation with horizontal and vertical lens shift and a 1.6x optical zoom. Designed for long-term use, the PowerLite 2250U offers up to 12,000 hours of lamp life in Eco mode.
key_features: 15,000:1 Contrast Ratio for Deep Blacks and Bright Whites
1.6x Optical Zoom for Flexible Image Adjustment
Long Lamp Life Up to 12,000 Hours in Eco Mode
meta_title: Epson PowerLite 2250U WUXGA 3LCD Projector - Professional Presentation Solution
